html: The heroin overdose hospitalization rate for Pennsylvanians age 55+ increased 35.8% in 2017, up 12.5% for residents overall, @PA_HC4 finds. Hispanic residents had the highest increase: 48.8%. Lower income residents: 40.8% increase. #ACommonwealthCrisis http://www.phc4.org/
text: The heroin overdose hospitalization rate for Pennsylvanians age 55+ increased 35.8% in 2017, up 12.5% for residents overall, @PA_HC4 finds. Hispanic residents had the highest increase: 48.8%. Lower income residents: 40.8% increase. #ACommonwealthCrisis http://www.phc4.org/

html: For decades, Joe DeNardo was Pittsburgh's weather guru! Years after he retired, someone came up to me & confused Jon Delano with Joe DeNardo, a great compliment but totally wrong. html: Act 8 closing a life-threatening loophole in PAs emergency prescription refill law has been enacted. text:

html: PA’s recently enacted animal cruelty law covers dogs who are tethered outside in harsh wintry conditions. Under Act 10 of 2017, dogs cannot be tethered outside longer than 30 minutes in temperatures below 32 degrees. More Act 10 details from @HumanePA:https://humane-pa.org/current-legislation-2/fact-sheets-about-pending-bills-2017/comprehensive-animal-cruelty-bill/ …
